about_the_game:
SIM Chef is a restaurant management simulator. Build and decorate, manage employees, create hundreds of classic dishes and drinks, make decisions and become the number one in the world.



You start with a small, empty piece of land. You have to build your restaurant from scratch and place walls, doors and windows. Once you have the hard-earned money, you can buy more land and expand your restaurant.
Use a collection of different objects, materials and colors to really make it yours.



Choose from over 200 different dishes and drinks with multiple nationalities, types, techniques and levels of difficulty to make your restaurant unique.
Think of the time to hire your chefs and choose your dishes so they can do it in the best possible way.



Think carefully when hiring your employees and analyze all skills, attributes, nationalities and experience levels.

  • Chef: You should hire chefs whose skills match your dishes (meat, soup, salad, vegan...).
  • Bartender: Each bartender has a specialty in one type of drink.
  • Ober: In addition to your experience, you should also keep an eye on your characteristics.

WIN AWARDS AND BE VOTED BY FOOD CRITICISTS



Win different types of prizes until you reach the gastronomic experience level so you can get much more profit and become the number 1 in the world.

  • City prices
  • National awards
  • Magazine prices
  • Youtuber Ratings
  • Earn world stars

PERSONALIZE YOUR RESTAURANT



Personalize your employees' clothing and dishes.

MANY WAYS TO PLAY



With the sandbox mode there are different possibilities in SIM Chef and there is no better way to play. You can spend your time decorating and making it look comfortable and beautiful, or you can try to maximize sales by tweaking seating arrangements, prices, staff salaries...

LOCALIZATION



SIM Chef has several translations available, but since it's an indie game, most of them were made with Google Translater, I hope to correct mistakes over time.
